name: The Adventures Of Bob (KimsGames)
description:
The Adventures Of Bob 0.1  (under development) 

This will be a retro RPG with isometric view. The first version is very basic with limited gameplay. It's part of an experiment, where I create a game that is playable right from the start. Therefore it's a finished game always (sort of...) Every now and then I will add features to the game, but I can never break the game.

I will make a dev log series on YouTube about this game (and experiment).

Watch it here:
